meanings.sent1: After fixing the error, please reexecute the program to see if it works correctly.
meanings.sent2: The computer program crashed, so I had to reexecute it to continue my work.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally deleted my essay, so I had to reexecute my writing process from scratch.
meanings.sent4: In order to ensure accuracy, the scientist decided to reexecute the experiment multiple times.
meanings.sent5: The chef had to reexecute the recipe to get the perfect balance of flavors.

meanings.definition: To carry out a task or command for a second time.
meanings.sent1: If the first attempt fails, you may need to reexecute the command to complete the task.
meanings.sent2: The supervisor asked me to reexecute the report after making some revisions.
meanings.sent3: The magician had to reexecute the trick to impress the audience after a mistake.
meanings.sent4: After the power outage, the team had to reexecute the presentation for the clients.
meanings.sent5: To ensure accuracy, the teacher requested the students to reexecute the experiment.
